text: Ani jara ase nasate ki tyanna, tyancya apalya hatanni pudhe pathavilelya karmampayi ekhadi kasta-yatana pohacali asati, tevha he udâ€Œgarale asate ki amacya palanakartya! Tu amacyakade ekhada rasula (paigambara) ka nahi pathavila ki amhi tujhya ayatince palana kele asate ani imana rakhanaryampaiki jhalo asato
